item.description: Violin and Piano Concert: European Jewish Composers Violinist Vera Rubin and pianist Yevgenia Semelina will perform "Romance San Paroles & Rondo Elegant" by Henryk Wieniawsky, "La Poupee Valsante" and other musical selections by Fritz Kreisler, as well as Ernest Bloch's works from "Thee Pictures of Chassidic Life." Also, as part of the concert are popular virtuoso compositions for violin and piano by American composer, John Williams, including the "Theme from Schindler's List" Date: Sunday November 13, 2011 Time: 2:00-3:00 Cost $5.00 per person
item.name: Sunday afternoons @ Temple Beth Shalom in Framingham
